GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiPresentation class.

GetCurSlideIndex.name: GetCurSlideIndex
GetCurSlideIndex.description: Returns the index for the current slide.

GetSlideByIndex.name: GetSlideByIndex
GetSlideByIndex.description: Returns a slide by its position in the presentation.

params.name: nIndex
params.description: The slide number (position) in the presentation.

AddSlide.name: AddSlide
AddSlide.description: Appends a new slide to the end of the presentation.

params.name: oSlide
params.description: The slide created using the {@link Api#CreateSlide} method.

SetSizes.name: SetSizes
SetSizes.description: Sets the size to the current presentation.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The presentation width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The presentation height in English measure units.

ReplaceCurrentImage.name: ReplaceCurrentImage
ReplaceCurrentImage.description: Replaces the current image with an image specified.

params.name: sImageUrl
params.description: The image source where the image to be inserted should be taken from (currently, only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: Width
params.description: The image width in English measure units.

params.name: Height
params.description: The image height in English measure units.

SetLanguage.name: SetLanguage
SetLanguage.description: Specifies the languages which will be used to check spelling and grammar (if requested).

params.name: sLangId
params.description: The possible value for this parameter is a language identifier as defined by RFC 4646/BCP 47. Example: "en-CA".

GetMaster.name: GetMaster
GetMaster.description: Returns a slide master by its position in the presentation.

params.name: nPos
params.description: Slide master position in the presentation

AddMaster.name: AddMaster
AddMaster.description: Adds the slide master to the presentation slide masters collection.

params.name: oApiMaster
params.description: The slide master to be added.

ApplyTheme.name: ApplyTheme
ApplyTheme.description: Applies a theme to all the slides in the presentation.

params.name: oApiTheme
params.description: The presentation theme.

RemoveSlides.name: RemoveSlides
RemoveSlides.description: Removes a range of slides from the presentation. Deletes all the slides from the presentation if no parameters are specified.

params.name: nStart
params.description: The starting position for the deletion range.

params.name: nCount
params.description: The number of slides to delete.

GetWidth.name: GetWidth
GetWidth.description: Returns the presentation width in English measure units.

GetHeight.name: GetHeight
GetHeight.description: Returns the presentation height in English measure units.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiPresentation object into the JSON object.

params.name: bWriteTableStyles
params.description: Specifies whether to write used table styles to the JSON object (true) or not (false).

SlidesToJSON.name: SlidesToJSON
SlidesToJSON.description: Converts the slides from the current ApiPresentation object into the JSON objects.

params.name: nStart
params.description: The index to the start slide.

params.name: nStart
params.description: The index to the end slide.

params.name: bWriteLayout
params.description: Specifies if the slide layout will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteMaster
params.description: Specifies if the slide master will be written to the JSON object or not (bWriteMaster is false if bWriteLayout === false).

params.name: bWriteAllMasLayouts
params.description: Specifies if all child layouts from the slide master will be written to the JSON object or not.

params.name: bWriteTableStyles
params.description: Specifies whether to write used table styles to the JSON object (true) or not (false).
